name: Rickey & Mort Dimensional Dilemma
description:
Is a fan game parody of Rick & Morty a popular cartoon from adult swim. you follow Rickey on a journey to save his family from the galactic federation who want to imprison all ricks for their crimes against the multiverse.

please keep in mind the game is currently in early beta, and we are looking forward to your feedback. 

Project Made By Luke Jackson Currently Working On

Information Section that labels all items ,characters and enemy's in the game, this will help new players and to expand the lore of our alternate reality.

Known Issues

Windows sometimes thinks the game is a virus and we are currently working on a solution,please comment if this is effecting you or if it worked fine, thanks :) .

Social Media

Here is a Facebook page for the game :D (Our official website coming soon)

https://www.facebook.com/RickeyAndMort/

What we plan to add in the future
  • More levels
  • Story and missions
  • More playable characters
  • Character unlock system based on story
  • Small cut scenes for a plot device.
  • Rewards for People Who Donate
Version 2.0+
  • Missiles now explode on impact.
  • Fixed placement of enemy's and power ups.
  • Added Character Selector and changed the way the Player spawns in the game.
  • Fixed power up animation when using different character.
Version 2.5+
  • Plentiful bug fixes
  • Added New loading/splash screen
  • Added copyright infomation
  • Added version counter
  • Created dialog system (not implemented yet)
  • Created Portal animation when spawning
  • Re design of main menus
  • Added difficultly to levels based on characters
  • Added Basic options menu
  • Created Icon Image 
  • Re worked information menu
  • Changed Menu Structure, you now get the option to change character when the game starts  rather then separate menu.
  • New Death/End of the game screen
  • Faster loading screen
